description.original: Integrate Git version control with automatic backup and other advanced features.
description.translation: 集成 Git 版本控制，具有自动备份和其他高级功能。

dict..setName(\"Specify custom commit message: .setName("在自动备份时指定自定义提交信息")
dict..setName(\"List filenames affected by co: .setName("在提交内容中列出受提交影响的文件名")
dict..setName(\"Show stage/unstage button in: .setName("在文件菜单中显示添加/取消添加按钮")
dict..setName(\"Show the count of modified fi: .setName("在状态栏显示已修改文件的数量")
dict..setName(\"Custom Git binary path\"): .setName("自定义 Git 二进制文件路径")
dict..setName(\"Additional PATH environment v: .setName("附加的 PATH 环境变量路径")
dict..setName(\"Reload with new environment v: .setName("使用新的环境变量重新加载")
dict..setName(\"Custom base path (Git reposit: .setName("自定义基础路径（Git 仓库路径）")
dict..setName(\"Custom Git directory path (In: .setName("自定义 Git 目录路径（而不是 '.git'）")
dict..setName(\"Follow movement and copies ac: .setName("跟随文件和提交中的移动和复制")
dict..setDesc(\"Enable to use separate timer: .setDesc("启用使用独立计时器进行提交和推送")
dict..setDesc(\"You will get a pop up to spec: .setDesc("你会弹出一个窗口来指定你的消息")
dict..setDesc(\"Specify custom hostname for e: .setDesc("为每个设备指定自定义主机名。")
dict..setDesc(\"Automatically pull updates wh: .setDesc("启动 Obsidian 时自动拉取更新")
dict..setDesc(\"Commit -> pull -> push (Only: .setDesc("提交 -> 拉取 -> 推送（仅当启用推送时）")
dict..setDesc(\"Show the author of the commit: .setDesc("在历史视图中显示提交的作者")
dict..setPlaceholder(\"directory/directory-wi: .setPlaceholder("目录/带 Git 仓库的目录")
